data.title: Crotone vs Lanciano FC live score, H2H and lineups
data.meta_description: Crotone Lanciano FC live score (and video online live stream) starts on 1 Apr 2016 at 18:30 UTC time at Stadio Ezio Scida stadium, Crotone city, Italy in Serie B, Italy.
data.text:
On Sofascore livescore you can find all previous Crotone vs Lanciano FC results sorted by their H2H matches. Sofascore also provides the best way to follow the live score of this game with various sports features. Therefore, you can:

Find out who scored in a live match

Get real-time information on which team is dominating the match using the Attack Momentum

Follow detailed statistics such as ball possession, shots, corner kicks, big chances created, cards, key passes, duels and more

Check all head to head matches – for instance, in the last season Crotone and Lanciano FC played 2 games against each other

Track all home and away games for each team in the Serie B

Check out how Sofascore community votes on which team is more likely to win this match.

All of these features can help you decide on Crotone vs. Lanciano FC game prediction. Even though Sofascore doesn't offer direct betting, it provides the best odds and shows you which sites offer live betting. Live U-TV odds are viewable on Sofascore's Football live score section.

Where to watch Crotone vs. Lanciano FC ? Under TV Channels section you can find the list of all channels that broadcast Crotone – Lanciano FC live match. You can also live stream this match through our betting partners or click on any links on Sofascore for a legal live stream.

Event details:

NAME: Crotone - Lanciano FC

DATE: 1 Apr 2016

TIME: 18:30 UTC

VENUE: Stadio Ezio Scida, Crotone, Italy

Sofascore livescore is available as iPhone and iPad app, Android app on Google Play and Windows phone app. You can find us in all stores on different languages as "Sofascore". Install Sofascore app on and follow Crotone Lanciano FC live on your mobile!
